sourcesContent:
// src/pages/DashboardPage.jsx
import React from 'react';
import { Box, Grid, Card, CardHeader, CardContent, Typography, Button } from '@mui/material';

function DashboardPage() {
  return (
    <Box>
      <Typography variant="h5" gutterBottom>
        Ana Sayfa (Dashboard)
      </Typography>

      <Grid container spacing={2}>
        {/* Sistem Durumu */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={8}>
          <Card>
            <CardHeader title="Sistem Durumu" />
            <CardContent>
              <Typography>Uptime: 23 saat 45 dakika</Typography>
              <Typography>CPU Kullanımı: %35</Typography>
              <Typography>Bellek Kullanımı: %62</Typography>
              <Typography>Aktif Bağlantılar: 120</Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
        {/* Anlık Tehditler */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Card>
            <CardHeader title="Anlık Tehditler" />
            <CardContent>
              <Typography>Şüpheli IP: 10.0.0.15</Typography>
              <Typography>Engellenen Port: 23 (Telnet)</Typography>
              <Typography>Bekleyen Alarm: 2 Güvenlik Uyarısı</Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>

      <Grid container spacing={2} sx={{ mt: 2 }}>
        {/* Ağ Trafiği */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={8}>
          <Card>
            <CardHeader title="Ağ Trafiği (Canlı Grafik)" />
            <CardContent sx={{ textAlign: 'center', height: 200 }}>
              <Typography variant="body2">[Trafik Grafiği placeholder]</Typography>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
        {/* Hızlı Erişim */}
        <Grid item xs={12} md={4}>
          <Card>
            <CardHeader title="Hızlı Erişim" />
            <CardContent>
              <Button variant="outlined" fullWidth sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
                Log Görüntüle
              </Button>
              <Button variant="outlined" fullWidth sx={{ mb: 1 }}>
                Kural Yönetimi
              </Button>
              <Button variant="outlined" fullWidth>
                Sistem Güncelle
              </Button>
            </CardContent>
          </Card>
        </Grid>
      </Grid>
    </Box>
  );
}

export default DashboardPage;
